Professional Experience

Senior Software Engineer – Data Automation

Eurofins IT | Bangalore, India

July 2022 – August 2024

  • Designed and implemented a scalable ETL data pipeline using Python, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI for data from 38 Azure tenants.
  • Led a team of six engineers as Scrum Master for a SharePoint data migration project, delivering ahead of schedule.
  • Developed a PowerApps app with SQL Stored Procedures, automating data entry across 146 locations.
  • Automated the migration of 6TB of unstructured data from on-premises SharePoint to Azure Blob Storage.
  • Built data ingestion pipelines for M365 activity logs, decreasing audit time by 70% and improving data governance.

Software Engineer

Eurofins IT | Bangalore, India

June 2018 – June 2022

  • Created and deployed scheduled jobs with Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from 18 distributed servers.
  • Developed the Eurofins travel request portal, reducing processing time from 10 days to 3 days.
  • Built a C# webapp to manage and display dynamic email distribution lists (1600+ entries) to over 60,000 users.

Projects

Sentiment Analysis Pipeline

Engineered a Python-based sentiment analysis pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews using BeautifulSoup and PySpark, ingested data into PostgreSQL, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.
